definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: This article makes an analysis of middle -distance and long-distance running.
sentences.chinese: 本文對中長跑比賽的相關問題加以淺析。

sentences.english: On Factors Affecting Middle and Long-distance Running Teaching Effect and Their Countermeasures at College Abstract: Through literature research, interview and mathematical st.
sentences.chinese: 普通高校中長跑教學效果的影響因素分析與對策研究。

sentences.english: African runners swept the medals in the distance events.
sentences.chinese: 在中長跑比賽中，非洲選手囊括了所有的獎牌。

sentences.english: Mid-long run is a movement that need endurance.
sentences.chinese: 中長跑是一項需要耐力的運動。
